name: Run bot

on:
  workflow_dispatch:
  push:
    branches:
      - "main"
    paths:
      - "user_interface.py"
  schedule:
    - cron: "1 */5 * * *"  # Every 5 hours at minute 1

jobs:
  build:
    concurrency:
      group: bot-run
      cancel-in-progress: false  # Keep this false for fastest restarts

    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    timeout-minutes: 355  # Just under 6-hour GitHub limit

    steps:
      - name: Checkout repo
        uses: actions/checkout@v3

      - name: Install GitHub CLI
        run: sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y gh

      - name: Set up Python
        uses: actions/setup-python@v4
        with:
          python-version: '3.11'

      - name: Cache pip dependencies
        uses: actions/cache@v4
        with:
          path: ~/.cache/pip
          key: ${{ runner.os }}-pip-${{ hashFiles('requirements.txt') }}
          restore-keys: |
            ${{ runner.os }}-pip-

      - name: Install Python dependencies
        run: pip install -r requirements.txt

      - name: Inject Secret Token
        run: sed -i "s/TokenTimeIsBackBuddyss/${{ secrets.LICHESS_KEY }}/g" config.yml

      - name: Make Stockfish Executable
        run: | 
          chmod +x ./engines/stockfish
          chmod +x ./engines/fairy-stockfish_x86-64-bmi2

      - name: Run Bot (Continuous with Auto-Restart)
        run: |
          echo "Starting continuous bot loop..."
          END=$((SECONDS + 20700))  # ~5h 45m total
          SESSION_TIME=2700         # 45 minutes per session
          while [ $SECONDS -lt $END ]; do
            echo "Launching bot instance..."
            python3 -u user_interface.py "matchmaking" &
            PID=$!
            # Kill bot after 45 minutes to restart
            ( sleep $SESSION_TIME && echo "Restarting bot..." && kill -SIGTERM $PID ) &
            wait $PID
            echo "Bot restarted..."
          done
          echo "Loop finished. Preparing workflow restart..."

      - name: üîÅ Self-Restart (Fire-and-Forget)
        if: always()
        run: gh workflow run bot.yml
        env:
          GH_TOKEN: ${{ secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN }}
